import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Spinner from 'react-bootstrap/Spinner' import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import Toast from 'react-bootstrap/Toast' import Cabecalho from '../components/Cabecalho' import Rodape from '../components/Rodape' import { BACKEND } from '../constants' const Categorias = () => { const [categorias, setCategorias] = useState([]) const [carregandoCategorias, setCarregandoCategorias] = useState(false) async function obterCategorias() { setCarregandoCategorias(true) let url = `${BACKEND}/categorias` await fetch(url) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { setCategorias(data) }) .catch(function (error) { console.error(`Erro ao obter as categorias: ${error.message}`) }) setCarregandoCategorias(false) } useEffect(() => { document.title = 'Cadastro de categorias' obterCategorias() }, []) return ( <>

Nome da Categoria
{carregandoCategorias && <>

Aguarde, enquanto as categorias são carregadas...

} {categorias.map(item => ( ))}

) } export default Categorias
